author: fab_10
content: <@131476523050860545> I would like to connect to the Besu instances on devnet-4 to debug them, could you help?

author: skylenet
content: you should have access to all besu servers if you use one of the keys that you have on github. try `ssh devops@lighthouse-besu-1.srv.4844-devnet-4.ethpandaops.io`

author: skylenet
content: great! Btw, we do have already some automatic process that watches the 4844 besu branch and pushes images to dockerhub. I just didn't use it before because the permissions fix wasn't there yet. Can you update the PR to use `ethpandaops/besu:eip-4844-interop-17a4928` instead ? (If you're curious, this is where we watch and build all the custom branches across the different eth clients: https://github.com/ethpandaops/eth-client-docker-image-builder/blob/master/config.yaml#L11 )
